api_key.label: Google Maps API key
api_key.info: Youâ€™ll need to enable both [Google Maps](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/map-section-api-key) and [Geocoding](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/geocoding/get-api-key) API keys to display the map.

image.label: Image
image.info: This image is displayed when the map is not used or cannot be loaded

show_gift_card_recipient_form.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products
show_gift_card_recipient_form.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

paragraph_1.content: Customize form features for the product in the products portion of the theme settings.

enable_local_pickup.label: Enable local pickup
enable_local_pickup.info: Include availability indicator for local pickup. Disable to exclude information for location inventory. [Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360056378914)

paragraph.content: To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/themes/product-merchandising/recommendations)

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

image.label: Image
image.info: 50 x 50px recommended. Uploading an image will override any icon selected above.

inventory_display.label: Display inventory quantity
inventory_display.info: Adjust the low stock threshold in the products portion of the theme settings.
inventory_display.option_2: Low stock and in stock threshold

paragraph_1.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews)
Receive customer messages about the product price and other purchase details.

gallery_image_crop.label: Enable image crop
gallery_image_crop.info: If disabled, white space will be applied around the image. Has no effect when media aspect ratio is set to natural.

gallery_hover_zoom.label: Roll-over image zoom
gallery_hover_zoom.info: Only applies to desktop screen sizes.

gallery_click_to_zoom.label: Click to zoom image
gallery_click_to_zoom.info: Changes to "Tap to zoom" on mobile.

paragraph_2.content: For the best zoom results, make sure your images are larger than 1600px.

enable_local_pickup.label: Enable local pickup
enable_local_pickup.info: Include availability indicator for local pickup. Disable to exclude information for location inventory. [Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360056378914)

minimum_age.label: Minimum age required to access page

image.label: Image
image.info: 50 x 50px recommended. Uploading an image will override any icon selected above.

filter_search_by.label: Refined search
filter_search_by.info: Allow customers to refine their search. [Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360025901534-Customizing-Empire-s-header-Search-bar)

enable_live_search_images.label: Show product images in live search results

textbox_text_position.label: Text position
textbox_text_position.info: Does not apply to full-width images

mobile_background_image.label: Mobile image
mobile_background_image.info: Optional. The slideshow will use the main slide image on mobile by default.

paragraph_1.content: Visit product grid in the theme settings to enable the quick shop. [customizing the quick shop](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/4404510868115)

announcement_text_mobile.label: Text (mobile)
announcement_text_mobile.info: Use this option if you want to display alternate text in mobile. Recommended for shortening announcement text to make suitable for mobile.

enable_subcollection.label: Enable subcollection
enable_subcollection.info: Connect your subcollections by building a tiered menu with matching handles. [Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360026084433)

menu.label: Menu
menu.info: This menu will show as many dropdown items as specified in "Menu depth visibility".

header_1.info: All of the following options apply to tag filtering only.

grid_categories.label: Display filters as grid
grid_categories.info: List groups to display in an alternate grid format, like â€œSize, Priceâ€. [Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360026081933-Setting-up-product-tag-filters-in-Empire#h_01EF06YZPQ09XNM718ACPA2ZXP)

custom_ordered_categories.label: Group order
custom_ordered_categories.info: Define a custom order for groups, like â€œColor, Brand, Sizeâ€. Other groups will appear at the bottom. [Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360026081933-Setting-up-product-tag-filters-in-Empire#h_01EF06ZAQF1S8VFM3HY70BT98H)

custom_ordered_tags.label: Tag order
custom_ordered_tags.info: Define a custom order for tags, like â€œSize_S, Size_M, Size_Lâ€. Items must exactly match tag name, including group prefix. Other tags will appear at the bottom. [Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360026081933#h_01G1GS9YC5GAWX7A10PQZKCK3D)

excluded_tags.label: Exclude tags
excluded_tags.info: Specify which tag(s) should be hidden from your customers, like â€œRed, T-shirts, Smallâ€. To exclude a group tag, make sure to specify the full name of the tag. For example: â€Size_Medium.â€ [Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360026081933#h_01F3ZWFDQ6625XJJCKRNAPTYKQ)

excluded_groups.label: Exclude groups
excluded_groups.info: Specify which group(s) should be hidden from your customers, like â€œColor, Brand, Sizeâ€. This will hide the group heading along with all of the tags within the group. [Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360026081933)

header_2.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

header_3.info: To add a country, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

additional_menu.label: Menu
additional_menu.info: This menu won't show dropdown items.

header_5.info: Display follow button for your storefront on the Shop app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

menu.label: Menu
menu.info: This menu won't show dropdown items.

paragraph_1.content: Social links can be managed in your Theme settings.

logo_width.label: Logo image max-width
logo_width.info: When adjusting the max-width, your logo image may disappear momentarily while a new logo image is generated

filter_search_by.label: Refined search
filter_search_by.info: Allow customers to refine their search. [Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360025901534-Customizing-Empire-s-header-Search-bar)

enable_live_search_images.label: Show product images in live search results

quick_links.label: Quick links
quick_links.info: Displays menu links below the search box the first time it is opened. This menu won't show dropdown items.

small_promo_text_mobile.label: Text (mobile)
small_promo_text_mobile.info: Use this option if you want to display alternate text in mobile. Recommended for shortening promo text to make suitable for mobile.

image.label: Image
image.info: 50 x 50px recommended. Uploading an image will override any icon selected above.

meganav_trigger.label: Mega menu trigger
meganav_trigger.info: Add the menu item that you want to turn into a mega menu.

meganav_trigger.label: Mega menu trigger
meganav_trigger.info: Add the menu item that you want to turn into a mega menu with sidebar.

image_crop.label: Enable image crop
image_crop.info: If disabled, white space will be applied around the image. Has no effect when media aspect ratio is set to natural.

menu_trigger.label: Menu trigger
menu_trigger.info: Add the menu item that you want to turn into a multi-column single menu.

logo_width.label: Logo image max-width
logo_width.info: When adjusting the max-width, your logo image may disappear momentarily while a new logo image is generated

show_product_recommendations.label: Show dynamic recommendations
show_product_recommendations.info: Dynamic recommendations change and improve with time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/themes/development/recommended-products)

enable_recently_viewed_products.label: Enable recently viewed products
enable_recently_viewed_products.info: This affects both the collection and product pages.

paragraph_1.content: Connect your subcollections by building a tiered menu with matching handles. [Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360026084433)

show_subcollection_menu.label: Show subcollections menu
show_subcollection_menu.info: Displays the subcollection links in the header.

header_3.info: Displays a call to action card at the end of each subcollection.

paragraph_1.content: Connect your subcollections by building a tiered menu with matching handles. [Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360026084433)
Connect your subcollections by building a tiered menu with matching handles. [Learn more](https://support.pixelunion.net/hc/en-us/articles/360026084433)

image_align.label: Image alignment
image_align.info: Only applies to desktop screen sizes.

header_4.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

header_5.info: To add a country, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

minimum_age.label: Minimum age required to access site

header_7.info: Used on modals and mobile nav overlays

type_heading_size.label: Size
type_heading_size.info: All heading sizes will be adjusted

reduce_animations.label: Reduce animations
reduce_animations.info: Reduces the amount of site-wide animations, making more page elements appear instantly.

inventory_status.label: Enable inventory status
inventory_status.info: Applies to product cards, search, and cart.

inventory_display.label: Display inventory quantity
inventory_display.option_2: Low stock and in stock threshold

sold_out_options.label: Sold out options
sold_out_options.info: Variants set to continue selling when out of stock will always be selectable.

show_dynamic_checkout_button.label: Show dynamic checkout button
show_dynamic_checkout_button.info: Each customer will see their preferred payment method from those available on your store, such as PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

enable_cart_redirection.label: Enable cart redirection
enable_cart_redirection.info: Automatically sends users to the Cart page after adding a product.

swatches_option_style.label: Color option style
swatches_option_style.info: Applies to product page and product card swatches.

swatches_custom_colors.label: Custom colors
swatches_custom_colors.info: Like â€œDeep Purple: #7000AAâ€ - one color per line, with names that exactly match your variants.

product_grid_emphasize_price.label: Emphasize price
product_grid_emphasize_price.info: Emphasizing the price will show the product's price above the title.

product_grid_show_second_image.label: Show second product image on hover

product_grid_image_crop.label: Enable image crop
product_grid_image_crop.info: If disabled, white space will be applied around the image. Has no effect when media aspect ratio is set to natural.

enable_orders_atc.label: Show "Add to cart" button on order pages.

enable_checkout_lock_icon.label: Show lock icon on checkout buttons

continue_shopping_url.label: Continue shopping link
continue_shopping_url.info: Where to direct customers after clicking "Continue shopping"
